name: Selphie
abilities: When Selphie enters the field, you may *search* for one ~Category VIII~ Forward and add it to your hand.
{0}: Choose 1 ~Category VIII~ forward other than Selphie. Until the end of the turn, it gains +1000 power, *Haste* and *Brave*. You can only use this ability during your turn and only once per turn.
